name: Chads Control The Weather
description:
The world lives and breathes only because Chads exist. Chads control the weather. Play as the very heavens itself, making sure Chad is safe at all times.

You are the heavens itself. Keep Chad safe at all times by controlling the weather and keeping away the Virgin Skeletons.

SPACE to PAUSE the game to plan out your move

(note: sometime [space] scroll the page instead, refresh the game if this happen)

[1-4] to SELECT the WEATHER type

[M1] to place down WEATHER on a tile

WEATHER TYPES

- LIGHTNING: Zap a bolt of lightning from the heavens, smiting down a single enemy and electrocuting a tile for 5 turns. I wonder what happens when you zap WATER or DRY LAND... 🤭

- RAIN: FLOOD a tile. I hear water is a great conductor. 🤔

- SUN: Dry out the land with a ray of sunlight almost as strong as CHAD himself. Watch out for FIRE. Creates hot air. Try not to get it near cold air... (with a gap of 1 tile)

- BLIZZARD: Freeze the ground. Watch out, ICE is slippery! Creates cold air. Try not to get it near hot air... (with a gap of 1 tile)
